attributes.action: Come clean regarding the relationship between CO2 Emmisions and Global Warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scientists have proof that there is no relationship between global warming and CO2! Why do we not see these eminent scientists complete with their ice core samples as proof that the CO2 fiasco is just that......a fiasco engineered by Governments to stop the developing world using their precious fuels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
